018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.InputStream;
023import java.nio.file.Files;
024import java.nio.file.Path;
025import java.util.Comparator;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
028import java.util.logging.LogManager;
029import java.util.stream.Collectors;
030import java.util.stream.Stream;
031
032import picocli.CommandLine;
033import picocli.CommandLine.Command;
034import picocli.CommandLine.Option;
035
036/**
037 * Main command-line interface for actor-IaC.
038 *
039 * <p>This is the entry point for all actor-IaC commands. Use subcommands to
040 * execute specific operations:</p>
041 *
042 * <h2>Subcommands</h2>
043 * <ul>
044 *   <li>{@code run} - Execute workflows</li>
045 *   <li>{@code list} - List available workflows</li>
046 *   <li>{@code describe} - Describe workflow structure</li>
047 *   <li>{@code logs} - Query execution logs</li>
048 *   <li>{@code db-clear} - Clear (delete) the log database</li>
049 * </ul>
050 *
051 * <h2>Usage Examples</h2>
052 * <pre>
053 * actor-iac run -d ./workflows -w deploy
054 * actor-iac list -d ./workflows
055 * actor-iac logs --db ./logs --list
056 * </pre>
057 *
058 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
059 * @since 2.7.0
060 */
061@Command(
062    name = "actor-iac",
063    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
064    versionProvider = VersionProvider.class,
065    description = "Infrastructure as Code workflow automation tool.",
066    subcommands = {
067        RunCLI.class,
068        ListWorkflowsCLI.class,
069        DescribeCLI.class,
070        LogsCLI.class,
071        MergeLogsCLI.class,
072        DbClearCLI.class
073    }
074)
075public class WorkflowCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
076
077    /**
078     * Main entry point.
079     *
080     * @param args command line arguments
081     */
082    public static void main(String[] args) {
083        // Load logging configuration from resources
084        try (InputStream is = WorkflowCLI.class.getResourceAsStream("/logging.properties")) {
085            if (is != null) {
086                LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(is);
087            }
088        } catch (IOException e) {
089            System.err.println("Warning: Failed to load logging.properties: " + e.getMessage());
090        }
091
092        int exitCode = new CommandLine(new WorkflowCLI()).execute(args);
093        System.exit(exitCode);
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * Called when no subcommand is specified.
098     * Shows help message.
099     */
100    @Override
101    public Integer call() {
102        System.out.println("actor-IaC - Infrastructure as Code workflow automation tool");
103        System.out.println();
104        System.out.println("Usage: actor-iac <command> [options]");
105        System.out.println();
106        System.out.println("Commands:");
107        System.out.println("  run          Execute a workflow");
108        System.out.println("  list         List available workflows");
109        System.out.println("  describe     Describe workflow structure");
110        System.out.println("  log-search   Search execution logs");
111        System.out.println("  log-merge    Merge scattered log databases into one");
112        System.out.println();
113        System.out.println("Examples:");
114        System.out.println("  actor-iac run -w sysinfo/main-collect-sysinfo.yaml -i inventory.ini");
115        System.out.println("  actor-iac run -d ./sysinfo -w main-collect-sysinfo.yaml -i inventory.ini");
116        System.out.println("  actor-iac list -w sysinfo");
117        System.out.println("  actor-iac describe -w sysinfo/main-collect-sysinfo.yaml");
118        System.out.println("  actor-iac log-search --db ./logs --list");
119        System.out.println();
120        System.out.println("Use 'actor-iac <command> --help' for more information about a command.");
121        return 0;
122    }
123}
124
125/**
126 * Subcommand to list workflows discovered under a directory.
127 */
128@Command(
129    name = "list",
130    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
131    versionProvider = VersionProvider.class,
132    description = "List workflows in the specified directory."
133)
134class ListWorkflowsCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
135
136    @Option(
137        names = {"-d", "--dir"},
138        description = "Base directory. Defaults to current directory.",
139        defaultValue = "."
140    )
141    private File baseDir;
142
143    @Option(
144        names = {"-w", "--workflow"},
145        required = true,
146        description = "Workflow directory path (relative to -d)"
147    )
148    private String workflowPath;
149
150    @Option(
151        names = {"-o", "--output"},
152        description = "Output format: table, json, yaml (default: table)",
153        defaultValue = "table"
154    )
155    private String outputFormat;
156
157    @Override
158    public Integer call() {
159        File workflowDir = new File(baseDir, workflowPath);
160        if (!workflowDir.isDirectory()) {
161            System.err.println("Not a directory: " + workflowDir);
162            return 1;
163        }
164
165        List<WorkflowInfo> workflows = scanWorkflowsForDisplay(workflowDir, workflowPath);
166        if (workflows.isEmpty()) {
167            if ("json".equalsIgnoreCase(outputFormat)) {
168                System.out.println("[]");
169            } else if ("yaml".equalsIgnoreCase(outputFormat)) {
170                System.out.println("workflows: []");
171            } else {
172                System.out.println("No workflow files found in " + workflowDir.getPath());
173            }
174            return 0;
175        }
176
177        switch (outputFormat.toLowerCase()) {
178            case "json" -> printJson(workflows);
179            case "yaml" -> printYaml(workflows);
180            default -> printTable(workflows, workflowDir.getPath());
181        }
182        return 0;
183    }
184
185    private void printTable(List<WorkflowInfo> workflows, String dirPath) {
186        System.out.println("Workflows in " + dirPath + ":");
187        System.out.println();
188        for (WorkflowInfo wf : workflows) {
189            System.out.println(wf.path());
190            if (wf.name() != null) {
191                System.out.println("  name: " + wf.name());
192            }
193            if (wf.description() != null) {
194                System.out.println("  description: " + wf.description());
195            }
196            if (wf.note() != null) {
197                System.out.println("  note: " + wf.note());
198            }
199            System.out.println();
200        }
201    }
202
203    private void printJson(List<WorkflowInfo> workflows) {
204        org.json.JSONArray arr = new org.json.JSONArray();
205        for (WorkflowInfo wf : workflows) {
206            org.json.JSONObject obj = new org.json.JSONObject();
207            obj.put("path", wf.path());
208            if (wf.name() != null) obj.put("name", wf.name());
209            if (wf.description() != null) obj.put("description", wf.description());
210            if (wf.note() != null) obj.put("note", wf.note());
211            arr.put(obj);
212        }
213        System.out.println(arr.toString(2));
214    }
215
216    private void printYaml(List<WorkflowInfo> workflows) {
217        System.out.println("workflows:");
218        for (WorkflowInfo wf : workflows) {
219            System.out.println("  - path: " + wf.path());
220            if (wf.name() != null) {
221                System.out.println("    name: " + wf.name());
222            }
223            if (wf.description() != null) {
224                // Handle multi-line descriptions
225                if (wf.description().contains("\n")) {
226                    System.out.println("    description: |");
227                    for (String line : wf.description().split("\n")) {
228                        System.out.println("      " + line);
229                    }
230                } else {
231                    System.out.println("    description: " + wf.description());
232                }
233            }
234            if (wf.note() != null) {
235                System.out.println("    note: " + wf.note());
236            }
237        }
238    }
239
240    private static List<WorkflowInfo> scanWorkflowsForDisplay(File directory, String workflowPath) {
241        if (directory == null) {
242            return List.of();
243        }
244
245        // Non-recursive scan - only files in immediate directory
246        try (Stream<Path> paths = Files.list(directory.toPath())) {
247            return paths.filter(Files::isRegularFile)
248                 .filter(path -> {
249                     String name = path.getFileName().toString().toLowerCase();
250                     return name.endsWith(".yaml") || name.endsWith(".yml")
251                         || name.endsWith(".json") || name.endsWith(".xml");
252                 })
253                 .map(path -> {
254                     File file = path.toFile();
255                     String relPath = workflowPath.endsWith("/")
256                         ? workflowPath + file.getName()
257                         : workflowPath + "/" + file.getName();
258                     return extractWorkflowInfo(file, relPath);
259                 })
260                 .sorted(Comparator.comparing(WorkflowInfo::path, String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER))
261                 .collect(Collectors.toList());
262        } catch (IOException e) {
263            System.err.println("Failed to scan workflows: " + e.getMessage());
264            return List.of();
265        }
266    }
267
268    private static WorkflowInfo extractWorkflowInfo(File file, String path) {
269        String fileName = file.getName().toLowerCase();
270        if (fileName.endsWith(".yaml") || fileName.endsWith(".yml")) {
271            return extractWorkflowInfoFromYaml(file, path);
272        } else if (fileName.endsWith(".json")) {
273            return extractWorkflowInfoFromJson(file, path);
274        }
275        return new WorkflowInfo(path, null, null, null);
276    }
277
278    private static WorkflowInfo extractWorkflowInfoFromYaml(File file, String path) {
279        String name = null;
280        String description = null;
281        String note = null;
282
283        try (java.io.BufferedReader reader = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.FileReader(file))) {
284            String line;
285            StringBuilder currentValue = new StringBuilder();
286            String currentField = null;
287            boolean inMultiLine = false;
288
289            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
290                // Stop at steps or vertices
291                if (line.trim().startsWith("steps:") || line.trim().startsWith("vertices:")) {
292                    break;
293                }
294
295                if (inMultiLine) {
296                    if (line.startsWith("  ") || line.startsWith("\t") || line.trim().isEmpty()) {
297                        if (!line.trim().isEmpty()) {
298                            currentValue.append(line.trim()).append(" ");
299                        }
300                        continue;
301                    } else {
302                        // End of multi-line
303                        String value = currentValue.toString().trim();
304                        if ("name".equals(currentField)) name = value;
305                        else if ("description".equals(currentField)) description = value;
306                        else if ("note".equals(currentField)) note = value;
307                        inMultiLine = false;
308                        currentValue = new StringBuilder();
309                        currentField = null;
310                    }
311                }
312
313                if (line.trim().startsWith("name:") && name == null) {
314                    String value = line.substring(line.indexOf(':') + 1).trim();
315                    if (value.equals("|") || value.equals(">")) {
316                        inMultiLine = true;
317                        currentField = "name";
318                    } else if (!value.isEmpty()) {
319                        name = stripQuotes(value);
320                    }
321                } else if (line.trim().startsWith("description:") && description == null) {
322                    String value = line.substring(line.indexOf(':') + 1).trim();
323                    if (value.equals("|") || value.equals(">")) {
324                        inMultiLine = true;
325                        currentField = "description";
326                    } else if (!value.isEmpty()) {
327                        description = stripQuotes(value);
328                    }
329                } else if (line.trim().startsWith("note:") && note == null) {
330                    String value = line.substring(line.indexOf(':') + 1).trim();
331                    if (value.equals("|") || value.equals(">")) {
332                        inMultiLine = true;
333                        currentField = "note";
334                    } else if (!value.isEmpty()) {
335                        note = stripQuotes(value);
336                    }
337                }
338            }
339
340            // Handle trailing multi-line
341            if (inMultiLine && currentValue.length() > 0) {
342                String value = currentValue.toString().trim();
343                if ("name".equals(currentField)) name = value;
344                else if ("description".equals(currentField)) description = value;
345                else if ("note".equals(currentField)) note = value;
346            }
347        } catch (IOException e) {
348            // Ignore
349        }
350        return new WorkflowInfo(path, name, description, note);
351    }
352
353    private static String stripQuotes(String value) {
354        if ((value.startsWith("\"") && value.endsWith("\"")) ||
355            (value.startsWith("'") && value.endsWith("'"))) {
356            return value.substring(1, value.length() - 1);
357        }
358        return value;
359    }
360
361    private static WorkflowInfo extractWorkflowInfoFromJson(File file, String path) {
362        try (java.io.FileReader reader = new java.io.FileReader(file)) {
363            org.json.JSONTokener tokener = new org.json.JSONTokener(reader);
364            org.json.JSONObject json = new org.json.JSONObject(tokener);
365            return new WorkflowInfo(
366                path,
367                json.optString("name", null),
368                json.optString("description", null),
369                json.optString("note", null)
370            );
371        } catch (Exception e) {
372            // Ignore
373        }
374        return new WorkflowInfo(path, null, null, null);
375    }
376
377    private static record WorkflowInfo(String path, String name, String description, String note) {}
378}
